name: RIHGA Royal Hotel Tokyo
description:
Property Location
Located in Tokyo, RIHGA Royal Hotel Tokyo is minutes from Okuma Garden and Chinzan-so Garden. This 4-star hotel is close to Tokyo Imperial Palace and Meiji Jingu Shrine.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 126 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Satellite programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a health club, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and a hair salon. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the complimentary area shuttle.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 3 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access room service (during limited hours). Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A train station pick-up service is provided at no charge, and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.

You can read a Japanese comic book or clean your clothes at the coin launderette. The 24-hour front desk offers luggage storage. This hotel does not have a restaurant.
Only men can stay at this hotel. An accommodation tax per person per night is not included in the rate and is to be paid directly at the property.

name: Super Hotel Asakusa
description: Sheraton Dubai Creek Hotel & Towers is a modern 5-star property offering upmarket accommodation in the heart of Dubai. Highlights include fine dining, an outdoor pool, tennis court, free valet parking and a great location overlooking Dubai Creek. Dubai Creek is located in the heart of the city, a pleasant body of water separating Deira from Bur Dubai. Nearby places of interest include the Port Saeed district, the Dubai Creek Golf & Yacht Club and Deira City Centre shopping mall. Union Square metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Dubai destinations. The hotel occupies a modern high-rise complex featuring a light-coloured facade with prominent use of glass and an impressive, triangular entrance. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, tennis court, gym, sauna, steam room and a spa offering a range of massages and wellness treatments. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Classic (Creek View) rooms are elegantly decorated in a traditional style with strong colours, hardwood furniture and striped wallpaper. Amenities include air-conditioning, chargeable wired internet, a flat-screen satellite TV with DVD player, mini-bar, work desk, safe and tea and coffee equipment. The en-suite bathrooms feature bathrobes, slippers and complimentary toiletries. Traditional Italian cuisine and stunning Dubai Creek views are available at the charming Vivaldi, whilst the stylish Ashiana offers fine Indian dishes and live entertainment in a pleasant setting. Guests can also enjoy pan-Asian cuisine at Creekside and televised sporting events and casual dining at Chelsea Arms. Light meals, drinks and snacks are also available throughout the day at the al-fresco Pool Snack Bar or at the 24-hour Lobby Café. Free valet parking is possible onsite. The hotel provides 24-hour reception, concierge and room service.

name: J Residence Shinjuku
description:
A 4-minute walk from Higashi-Shinjuku Subway Station and 1.1 km from Shinjuku Train Station, J Residence offers air-conditioned 2-person apartments with free wired internet, a small kitchen and a balcony. Compact and simply furnished, each apartment at J Residence Shinjuku comes with an LCD TV, a hairdryer and toiletries. The kitchen includes a microwave, an electric kettle and a fridge. A rice cooker is also provided. Located in the lively Kabukicho area, the hotel is an 8-minute walk from Isetan Department Store. Nearby Higashi-Shinjuku Station offers direct subway access to the Shibuya and Ikebukuro areas as well as Shinjuku Train Station. A coin launderette is on site. This property does not have a restaurant.
DIRECTIONS: Go to Higashi-Shinjuku Subway Station on the Oedo Subway Line. Take Exit A1, turn right and then turn right down the first side street you come to. The property is 90 metres ahead, the building at the very end of the straightaway. Credit card will be used for guarantee purposes only. When settling the bill, the hotel will accept cash only. The full amount of the reservation must be paid when checking in. Upon check-in photo identification (passport) is required. An extra charge applies for check-in after 21:00, unless the hotel is informed in advance.

description:

Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, while DVD players and satellite programming provide entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature deep soaking bathtubs and rainfall showerheads. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a steam room and a 24-hour fitness center. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), babysitting/childcare, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a 24-hour business center, and limo/town car service. Planning an event in Tokyo? This hotel has facilities measuring 1076 square feet (100 square meters), including meeting rooms. A train station pick-up service is provided at no charge, and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.

name: Shinagawa Prince Hotel
description:
Shinagawa and Takanawa Prince Hotel combined becomes one of the biggest entertainment hotel complexes in the world. In this area, prince chain provides 7 varieties of towers (5430 rooms) which ensure to meet the wide range of needs, from recreational, leisure to business purposes and also your budget.
There's more to make you smile at the unique Prince Hotels. All across the country, we always welcome you with service that surpasses your expectations. Now, Shinagawa is attracting great attention as Tokyo's new urban center. The Shinagawa Prince Hotel is an exciting entertainment hotel with a great variety of facilities, including 3,679 guest rooms, banquet halls, restaurants and cafs, concert hall, choice of cinemas, bowling alleys and even an aquarium.
The hotel is right across from Shinagawa JR Station, for easy access to all of Tokyo, Airports and all of Japan. The hotel is located only 2min walk from Shinagawa station JR Lines, Keihin Kyuko, and Shinkansen. The location offers easy access to major areas of Tokyo such as Roppongi (20min), Akihabara (15min), Ginza (10min), and Shinjuku (20min). Free shuttle bus from/to Shinagawa station is available. Airport limousine bus from Narita airport (NRT) is 1.5hr and Haneda airport (HND) is 45min to the hotel. From Haneda Airport, it takes as little as 14min on the Keihin Kyuko Line if you take a rapid limited express.
(Shinagawa and Takanawa Prince Hotel complex) *For more detail, refer to Photos

name: Tokyo Banyan
description: Floors: 2. Total rooms: 45. Suites: 22. Stay at this Delhi hotel ideally situated near the historic Indian Reservation of Poverty Point. The BEST WESTERN Delhi Inn is conveniently located near Civil War Park, beautifully preserved antebellum homes and Poverty Point Lake. Hotel guests will also have easy access to riverboat casinos and the Black Bear Golf Course. Each spacious, well-appointed room at this Delhi hotel comes equipped with cable satellite television with HBO®, coffee/tea maker, iron/ironing board and hairdryer. The hotel also offers an outdoor swimming pool, high-speed Internet access and a complimentary continental breakfast. Pets are welcome. A friendly and knowledgeable staff is ready to ensure a comfortable and memorable stay. Make an online reservation today at the BEST WESTERN Delhi Inn! . ·From: The east. Take Interstate 20 to Exit 153. At the end of the exit turn right, then travel .25 miles on the frontage road to the BEST WESTERN Delhi Inn.Restaurants: 1 mile(s) from Dairy Queen . Handy House, cafe Monday thru Saturday 6:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m.Area Info: 9 mile(s) from Poverty Point , 30 mile(s) from Civil War Park, antebellum home tours and Funtricity Park, Outdoor pool , 30 mile(s) from riverboat casino

name: The Agnes
description:
The phrase "intimate memories begin with a warm greeting" symbolize the image of the hotel. Every friendly staff's greeting is genuine and you can truly sense in an instant that they are always there to assist you with your needs to make your stay more enjoyable.(1005YS)
This hotel & apartment is located in the area called Iidabashi, the home to many schools and universities. It is 5 minutes walk from Subway Iidabashi Station and JR Iidabashi Station, 2 minutes by train from Tokyo Dome, 15 minutes by train from popular sightseeing places such as, Shinjuku and Ginza.
Carefully appointed guest rooms and suites reflect the needs of international business travelers who are tired of staying at the conventional hotels in Tokyo. All guest rooms are large in size, and are fully equipped with modern comforts such as jaccuzi bathtub, shower booth, safe box, refridgerator, microwave, cable TV, and computer modem link-up. The rooms and bathrooms are in very good condition.
The 5 stories brown building nestles in Kagurazaka, a distrct steeped old-town traditions and culture.
The hotel features one restaurant, one bar and one lounge, which serve you a range of international cuisine and beverages to please your culinary cravings.
The lobby of the hotel is small with a home away from home ambiance and plush comfortable sofas.

name: Edoya Ryokan
description: Centrally located in Tokyo, Hotel Edoya Tokyo boasts a public hot bath, a terrace and spacious Japanese-style rooms. The hotel features a restaurant, free Wi-Fi at the lobby and free parking. Rooms at Hotel Edoya Tokyo come with a seating area, tatami-mat flooring and comfortable futon bedding. They are equipped with a TV, a refrigerator and facilities to make tea or coffee. Guests can soak away the city stress in the spacious open-air bath, or enjoy a relaxing massage. The hotel provides coin-operated laundry facilities, and it serves free tea and coffee in the lobby. The daily breakfast buffet with local and Western fare is available at Umejaya Restaurant. The restaurant serves local cuisine, ranging from simple snacks to traditional course meals with seasonal dishes. Close to a number of stations, Hotel Edoya Tokyo is a 3-minute walk from Yushima Subway Station and a 10-minute walk to Ochanomizu Station. Shopping area Akihabara is a 15-minute walk away.

description:
Property Location

Rooms

Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Amenities

name: Park Hotel Tokyo
description:
The Park Hotel Tokyo is ideally situated in Shiodome a flourishing new center of business and culture.This luxury business hotel in Tokyo provides a superior level of service to satisfy the needs of our international clientele. As a member of the design hotelsTM group, the Park Hotel Tokyo offers an extraordinary level of service and coordinated interior designs.

The Park Hotel Tokyo logo, which shows its color concept throughout the hotel's interior, reflects a feeling of warmth and sophistication. 
Blue represents for clean comfort, green is for nature, and red represents warmth, an expression of Park Hotel Tokyo's warm at-home hospitality. We strive to be your "one and only" hotel in Tokyo for all your accommodation needs, whatever they may be.

The Park Hotel Tokyo also pays homage to local natural traditions of nature and this is translated in the hotel's glass-roofed atrium. A soothing haven of trees and greenery, it stretches between the building's 25th and 34th floors, creating a well of warming sunlight that augments the sensation of balance and vitality fostered by the architecture.\nMinato is one of the 23 wards of Tokyo, Japan. As of 1 March 2008, it was recorded of having an official population of 217,335 and a density of 10,865 persons per km. The total area of Minato-ku is 20.34 km.

Minato hosts 49 embassies. It is also home to various companies, including Honda, Mitsubishi Heavy Industries, Ltd., Mitsubishi Motors Corporation, NEC, Sony, Fujitsu and Toshiba.

Minato is located southwest of the Imperial Palace and has boundaries with the wards of Chiyoda, Ch, Kt (in Odaiba), Shinagawa, Shibuya, and Shinjuku.

Minato-ku has ultra-modern attractions, such as the man-made island of Odaiba, and entertainment centers like Roppongi. In Minato-ku a visitor can also enjoy a variety of activities from windsurfing in the Tokyo Bay to visits to, parks, and historic temples and shrines.\nCITY VIEW-QUEEN ROOM - Room Size is 22sq.m.
Queen bed, city view and floor to ceiling windows. Each room is decorated with Monique Le Houelleur's natural artwork and features color coordinated curtains and bedcovers. name: Shimane Inn Aoyama
description: Floors: 5. Total rooms: 107. Suites: 20. Nonsmoking rooms: 107. Located Ocean Front, with the beautiful Pacific Ocean and its gentle, sloping beach just steps from the front door, make the Ocean View Resort in Seaside the right choice for your vacation and family lodging needs. Seaside is home to more leisure activities and recreational options than any destination resort on the Oregon or Washington coast. Golf, hiking, shopping, dining, skim boarding, surfing, sunning, or just relaxing on the beach. Just seven miles from Cannon Beach, 12 miles from Astoria and only 15 minutes from Ft. Clatsop and the Lewis & Clark Historical Park, the BEST WESTERN Ocean View Resort, offers you exceptional value and lodging options in a full service hotel. Our Ocean Front rooms include a private balcony, fireplace, pillow-top beds and sunsets only found on a postcard. Ocean Front rooms come in three choices. Choose from two queen beds (the 2nd bed is a wall bed) with a kitchenette, jetted hot tub with a king bed room; Two room suite with two separate bathrooms, three beds and kitchenette. All ocean front rooms include a private balcony or patio, fireplace, pillow-top beds and sunsets found only on a post card. We offer rooms with partial ocean views and two queen beds; or a small economy-style, non-view single queen room for the budget minded guest offering all of the comforts of a full-service hotel. All rooms include refrigerator/microwave, pillow-top beds, high quality bed linens, cable TV, and a staff waiting to serve you. The resort is 100% smoke-free, with complimentary wireless Internet access available throughout the hotel, indoor pool/spa, and a service staff with a can do attitude. Salvatore's Cafe is an exceptional Italian-American restaurant offering outstanding American style breakfast options and dinners to savour. Sal's Pub offers an extensive selection of Northwest wines, micro brews on tap, and an appetizer menu. Those incredible sunsets are only made better with room service Salvatore's style. We will be undergoing a lobby renovation through Mar.12th (excl. weekends). Work will be conducted between 9am and 6pm daily. Our staff will make every effort to keep interruptions and inconveniences to a minimum. Thank you for your understanding.. ·From: The north. Drive south on Highway 101 into Seaside. Turn right at 12th Avenue (first traffic light, at the outlet mall). Cross the river, turn left on Necanicum (runs along the river). Turn right on 4th Avenue. Go two blocks to the BEST WESTERN Ocean View Resort. ·From: The south. Drive north on Highway 101 into Seaside. Turn left on First Avenue (at library, two streets past second traffic light). Cross the river, turn right on Downing. Turn left on Fourth Avenue. Go one block to the BEST WESTERN Ocean View Resort. ·From: The east. Take Highway 26 West from Portland for 75 miles. Turn north on Highway 101 at Seaside. Turn left on First Avenue (at library, two streets past second traffic light). Cross the river, turn right on Downing. Turn left on Fourth Avenue. Go one block to the BEST WESTERN Ocean View Resort.Restaurants: Salvatore's Café, on premises, bar/lounge, Italian, open for: breakfast, dinner, family-style Italian cuisine, as well as American favorites. Hours are 7:00 a.m. to 10:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. to 9:00 p.m.. Sal's Pub, on premises, bar/lounge, American, open for: dinner Area Info: 7.00 mile(s) from Cannon Beach , 17.00 mile(s) from Astoria , 36.00 mile(s) from Tillamook , 75.00 mile(s) from Portland , 75.00 mile(s) from Lincoln City , 85.00 mile(s) from Salem , 180 mile(s) from Eugene , 190 mile(s) from Seattle , 18.00 mile(s) from Clatsop Community College, 0.10 mile(s) from The Promenade, Side walk along the beach, 0.20 mile(s) from Seaside Aquarium, 0.30 mile(s) from Seaside Civic & Convention Center, 0.40 mile(s) from the End of the Lewis & Clark expedition, Seaside's Million Dollar Walk, Fascination Games, Funland Amusement Park, arcade, shops, boutiques, galleries, dining, 0.60 mile(s) from Seaside Antique Mall, Seaside Museum and Historical Society, 0.80 mile(s) from Cannes Cinema Center, 7.00 mile(s) from Cannon Beach and Haystack, 8.00 mile(s) from Cullaby Lake County Park, with facilities for picnicking, fishing, swimming, sailboarding, kayaking and water skiing., 14.00 mile(s) from Fort Clatsop National Memorial, and Fort Stevens State Park, 16.00 mile(s) from Columbia River Maritime Museum, 17.00 mile(s) from Captain George Flavel House, Heritage and Firefighters Museum and Astor Column, 21.00 mile(s) from Camp 18 Outdoor Logging Museum, 40.00 mile(s) from Tillamook Cheese Factory, 0.40 mile(s) from Town Center Mall , 0.80 mile(s) from Seaside Factory Outlet Center , 1.00 mile(s) from Recreation Center, with tennis and basketball courts, pools, playground, childcare, inline skate-skateboard park, 2.00 mile(s) from Seaside Golf Course , 3.00 mile(s) from L.O.G. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries.

Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a health club, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). If you're planning a day at a nearby theme park, you can hop on the complimentary shuttle.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 8 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access room service (during limited hours). Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a 24-hour business center, and limo/town car service. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge during limited hours, and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.

name: Asakusa Central Hotel
description:
Ideally located just a 3-minute walk from iconic Kaminari-mon Gate and Senso-ji Temple in historic Asakusa area, this hotel offers comfortable guest rooms, a men-only public bath, and beauty massage services for female guests. Guests can try on traditional kimono for a fee. Free Wi-Fi is available in all areas. Asakusa Central Hotel is a 20-minute walk from Tokyo Sky Tree, the tallest tower in the world. Asakusa Subway Station, a 5-minute walk away, provides direct subway access to Ueno, Akihabara and Ginza areas. Each simple guest rooms come with facilities like a flat-screen TV, a fridge and a telephone. An electric kettle with tea bags is also included. The en suite bathroom has a bath tub, a hairdryer and free toiletries. While staying at Central Hotel Asakusa, guests can use coin launderette or ask for massage services. Laptops can be rented from the front desk at a surcharge. Western or Japanese breakfast can be enjoyed at Gusto café restaurant, which also offers light meals throughout the day. There is also a 24-hour convenience store on site.
Guests arriving after 22:00 must inform the property in advance. Contact details can be found on the booking confirmation.

name: Belmont
description:
Welcome to Belmont Hotel Tokyo..Most Affordable Budget Hotel in TokyoFor budget conscious travelers to Tokyo, The Belmont Hotel Tokyo is the obvious choice offering comfortable accommodation in Tokyo Hotels with facilities and quality amenities to make your stay a memorable one.This Tokyo hotel has 79 cozy guestrooms that are well furnished and equipped with modern amenities. Guests can dine at the onsite restaurant that serves a variety of cuisine throughout the day. The lobby is a perfect place to relax and meet friends or business delegates. During leisure, guests can explore the city and its surrounding attractions.Located in Asakusabashi area, next to Akihabara electrical town, The Belmont Hotel Tokyo is conveniently tucked away for guests shopping for the latest electronic gadgets.The nearest station, Asakusabashi, is accessed from Narita International Airport by Keisei express train without any transit within 80 minutes.
Located in Asakusabashi area, next to Akihabara electrical town, The Belmont Hotel Tokyo is conveniently tucked away for guests shopping for the latest electronic gadgets.The nearest station, Asakusabashi, is accessed from Narita International Airport by Keisei express train without any transit within 80 minutes.DirectionsNearest Station 2min. walk from Exit A1 of Asakusabashi Sta. on the Toei Asakusa subway Line. 2min. walk from East Exit of Asakusabashi Sta. on the JR Sobu Line.From Narita International Airport Approx. 60min. by Limited Express train on the Keisei Line to Aoto. Then transfer to Keisei Line, and 15min. to Asakusabashi. Approx. 80min. by Narita Express (NEX) to Tokyo. Then transfer to JR Yamanote Line, and 1 stop to Akihabara, and then take JR Sobu Line to Asakusabashi. Approx. 80-100min. by Airport Limousine Bus to Tokyo.

description: Located just a two-minute walk from Ueno Subway Station, Hotel Yamayuri offers modest accommodation and easy access to the vibrant city of Tokyo. Nearby Ueno Station offers direct access to the Ginza, Akihabara and Roppongi areas.The hotel's modest, air-conditioned rooms come with an LCD television, handy refrigerator, and a private bathroom with bath amenities. A Japanese-style room with tatami-mat floors and futon bedding is also available. Massages can be arranged, and the hotel helpfully offers luggage storage and an internet station in the lobby. Guests can enjoy fresh green tea or try on the linen yukata robe, all during a fantastic sightseeing holiday or productive business trip.
